title: Online Arbitrage (No Experience Required)
job_overview:
We’re US-based Amazon sellers looking to bring on a committed and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to join our team long-term. We're open to hiring someone with no prior VA experience — but only if you're serious, ready to learn, and willing to put in the work. We care more about your mindset, work ethic, and honesty than your resume.

That said, we will check how many jobs you've applied to. If it looks like you're mass-applying without reading, you will be automatically passed on. We don’t have time to waste — and we don’t give second chances if trust is broken or instructions are ignored.

Daily Tasks:

Source products for Online Arbitrage using SellerAmp and Keepa

Track and organize leads in Google Sheets

Requirements:

Reliable internet connection

Ability to follow instructions carefully

SellerAmp & Keepa experience is a plus, but not required if you're hungry to learn

Must use a time tracker while working (no exceptions)

Perks:

Flexible schedule

Bi-weekly pay

Bonuses based on performance and consistency

Room to grow with a fast-paced team

DO NOT use ChatGPT or AI to apply.
We can spot it — and we only consider real, personalized responses.

To Apply, Answer These Questions:

How much experience do you have with Amazon OA (if any)?

What’s your favorite animal and why?

How soon can you start?

Tell us about you – who are you, what are your goals, and why do you deserve this opportunity?

If you have experience, walk us through how you analyze a product using Keepa and SellerAmp.


Use “PDX VA7” as your subject line for your application   when applying. Any missed instruction = disqualified.
